description: This source file defines a single exported asynchronous function 'listDevicesRaw' that fetches a raw list of device data from either mock data or the backend API. It utilizes imported modules for HTTP requests and mock mode detection, and conditionally imports a devices module when in mock mode to avoid circular dependencies.

methods.name: listDevicesRaw()
methods.description: Fetches a list of all devices from the backend or mock mode, normalizing device IDs and IP addresses.
